txt.en: You have discovered the shoulder and arm piece of the Helgi Goblinbane statue from the Chamber of the Cross-roads.\n\nThe goblins of Durin's Way destroyed the statue, and its parts can be found scattered throughout Moria. A dwarf named Uxi endeavours to reassemble this statue.

'Ah, this is an interesting artifact. It appears to be the shoulder and arm of the Helgi Goblinbane statue that Uxi wishes to reassemble. It is incredible that this piece has travelled so far!\n\n'I will have this sent to Uxi at once. He will be glad to see it safe.'
'You must retrieve that statue-piece from the Orcs...I saw them go east with it!'
You have discovered the shoulder and arm piece of the Helgi Goblinbane statue from the Chamber of the Cross-roads.
Recovered Helgi Goblinbane's shoulder and arm
The statue-piece can be found in the middle of the Redhorn Lodes.\n\nYou should bring the statue-piece to someone in the Redhorn Lodes.

Knakk is at a hidden camp, located on the elevated walkway in the north-east corner of the Redhorn Lodes.\n\nYou should bring the statue-piece to Knakk, who can send it along to Uxi in the Chamber of the Cross-roads to be reassembled.
